text: Now there were some present on that occasion who told him about the Galileans whose blood Pilate had mixed with their sacrifices.

<st data-num="2532" class="">He</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “Do you <st data-num="1380" class="">think</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="1057" class="">Galileans</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">were</st> worse <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3844" class="">than</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the other <st data-num="1057" class="">Galileans</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they <st data-num="3958" class="">suffered</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st>?

<st data-num="3780" class="">No</st>, I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>! <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3362">unless</st> you <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st>,<n id="1" /> you will <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="622" class="">perish</st> <st data-num="3668">as well</st>!<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="1178">eighteen</st> <st data-num="1909">who</st> were <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st><n id="1" /> when the <st data-num="4444" class="">tower</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4611" class="">Siloam</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1909">on</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">them</st>,<n id="2" /> do you <st data-num="1380" class="">think</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="1096">were</st> worse <st data-num="3781" class="">offenders</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">than</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="444" class="">others</st> who <st data-num="2730">live in</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>?<n id="3" />
No, I tell you! But unless you repent you will all perish as well!”
Then Jesus told this parable: “A man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard, and he came looking for fruit on it and found none.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="289">worker who tended the vineyard</st>, ‘For<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st><n id="3" /> now, I have <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">looking for</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4808" class="">fig tree</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> each time I inspect it<n id="4" /> I <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">none</st>. <st data-num="1581" class="">Cut</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1581">down</st>! <st data-num="2444" class="">Why</st><n id="6" /> should it continue to <st data-num="2673" class="">deplete</st><n id="7" /> the <st data-num="1093" class="">soil?’</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the worker<n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, ‘<st data-num="2962">Sir</st>, <st data-num="863" class="">leave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="863">alone</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">year</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> I <st data-num="4626" class="">dig</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">around</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="906" class="">put</st> <st data-num="2874" class="">fertilizer</st><n id="2" /> on it.
Then if it bears fruit next year, very well, but if not, you can cut it down.’”
Now he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the Sabbath,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> was <st data-num="2400">there</st><n id="1" /> who <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> been <st data-num="769" class="">disabled</st> by a <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="1178">eighteen</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st>. She<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1510">was</st> <st data-num="4794">bent over</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="352">straighten herself up</st> <st data-num="3838" class="">completely</st>.<n id="4" />

When<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, he <st data-num="4377" class="">called</st> her <st data-num="4377">to</st> him<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="1135" class="">Woman</st>,<n id="3" /> you are <st data-num="630" class="">freed</st><n id="4" /> from <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="769" class="">infirmity</st>.”<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="2007" class="">placed</st> his <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> on <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3916" class="">immediately</st><n id="2" /> she <st data-num="461" class="">straightened up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1392" class="">praised</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="752">president of the synagogue</st>, <st data-num="23" class="">indignant</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> had <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st> on the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>, “There <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1803" class="">six</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="2038" class="">work</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1163" class="">should</st> be done!<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st><n id="3" /> and be <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846">those days</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> “You <st data-num="5273" class="">hypocrites</st>! Does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> on the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st> <st data-num="3089" class="">untie</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1016" class="">ox</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3688" class="">donkey</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> its <st data-num="5336" class="">stall</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="520" class="">lead</st> it to <st data-num="4222" class="">water</st>?<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> shouldn’t<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this woman</st>, a <st data-num="2364" class="">daughter</st> of <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1210" class="">bound</st> for <st data-num="1176 3638">eighteen</st> long<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st>, <st data-num="1163" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3089" class="">released</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1199" class="">imprisonment</st><n id="5" /> on the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>?”
When he said this, all his adversaries were humiliated, but the entire crowd was rejoicing at all the wonderful things he was doing.
Thus Jesus asked, “What is the kingdom of God like? To what should I compare it?
It is like a mustard seed that a man took and sowed in his garden. It grew and became a tree, and the wild birds nested in its branches.”
Again he said, “To what should I compare the kingdom of God?
It is like yeast that a woman took and mixed with three measures of flour until all the dough had risen.”
Then Jesus traveled throughout towns and villages, teaching and making his way toward Jerusalem.

<st data-num="5100" class="">Someone</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">asked</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, will <st data-num="1487">only</st> a <st data-num="3641" class="">few</st><n id="3" /> be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>?” <st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="4" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,

“<st data-num="75">Exert every effort</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="4728" class="">narrow</st> <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st>, I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, will <st data-num="2212" class="">try</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2480" class="">be able</st> to.

<st data-num="575 3739">Once</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3617" class="">head of the house</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1453">gets up</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="608" class="">shuts</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">then</st> you will <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="757">start</st> to <st data-num="2925" class="">knock</st> on the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">beg</st> him, ‘<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>,<n id="4" /> let <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="455" class="">in!’</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">But</st> he will <st data-num="611" class="">answer</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,<n id="6" /> ‘I <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4159" class="">where</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510">come from</st>.’<n id="7" />

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> you will <st data-num="757">begin</st> to <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, ‘We <st data-num="2068">ate</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drank</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">presence</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="1321" class="">taught</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4116">streets</st>.’<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> he will <st data-num="3004" class="">reply</st>,<n id="2" /> ‘I <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4159" class="">where</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4159">from</st>!<n id="3" /> <st data-num="868" class="">Go away</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> you <st data-num="2040 93" class="">evildoers</st>!’<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1563" class="">There</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2805" class="">weeping</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1030" class="">gnashing</st> of <st data-num="3599" class="">teeth</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> you <st data-num="3708">see</st> <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st>, <st data-num="2464" class="">Isaac</st>, <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> yourselves <st data-num="1544" class="">thrown</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">out</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> people<n id="2" /> will <st data-num="2240" class="">come</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="395" class="">east</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1424" class="">west</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1005" class="">north</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3558" class="">south</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="347">take</st> their <st data-num="347">places at the banquet table</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.<n id="4" />
But indeed, some are last who will be first, and some are first who will be last.”
At that time, some Pharisees came up and said to Jesus, “Get away from here because Herod wants to kill you.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="4198">Go</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">tell</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> <st data-num="258" class="">fox</st>,<n id="3" /> ‘<st data-num="2400">Look</st>, I am <st data-num="1544">casting out</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="658" class="">performing</st> <st data-num="2392" class="">healings</st> <st data-num="4594" class="">today</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="839" class="">tomorrow</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> on the <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st> day<n id="4" /> I will <st data-num="5048" class="">complete</st> my work.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="4133" class="">Nevertheless</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4198">go on</st> my way <st data-num="4594" class="">today</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="839" class="">tomorrow</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2192" class="">next day</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> it is <st data-num="3756 1735">impossible</st><n id="2" /> that a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st> should be <st data-num="622" class="">killed</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem.’</st><n id="4" />

O <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>, <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>,<n id="1" /> you who <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3036" class="">stone</st> those who are <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">you</st>!<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4212">How often</st> I have <st data-num="2309" class="">longed</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="1996" class="">gather</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> together <st data-num="5158" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="3733" class="">hen</st> gathers <st data-num="1438" class="">her</st> <st data-num="3555" class="">chicks</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> her <st data-num="4420" class="">wings</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="4" /> you <st data-num="2309" class="">would have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">none</st> of it!<n id="5" />
Look, your house is forsaken! And I tell you, you will not see me until you say, ‘Blessed is the one who comes in the name of the Lord!’”
